lead_paragraph: Rob Moore, the No. 2 executive at Paramount Pictures, was a principal architect of its underperforming film slate and disagreed with Sumner Redstone on a proposal to sell part of the studio.

byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes contributed reporting from Los Angeles

headline.main: Paramount’s Vice Chairman to Leave, Adding to Upheaval at Viacom

snippet: Rob Moore, the No. 2 executive at Paramount Pictures, was a principal architect of its underperforming film slate and disagreed with Sumner Redstone on a proposal to sell part of the studio....
